answers.answer: Everything will be ok.. it's not news you want to hear. I had it with my first we were both good just take care eat healthy.. hopefully it's not high enough for you to have to take medication

All u have to do is eat healthy and workout for like 30 mins, just go walking. I had it but didn't eat healthy and had big baby boy weighting 9 pounds 13oz, that the only thing you really have to worry about is having a big baby. When having gestional diabetes, it's pretty normal

Ah im now 34 weeks.and I have it too.it's really hard.because a lot of food that we are not allow to eat.but stay strong! I'm doing it with you.and don't stress yourself because it will stress baby too.just eat healthy and stay active.
thanks ladies! nice to know im not alone. :)

I'm with ya! I was so surprised to hear the news I've never had issues with sugar.. Mine is jus out of control. No matter wat or how much I eat even after walking and doing housework my #'s are high.. So I've been put on insulin this is my second week of using it.. They've already doubled the dose n I take 5 shots a day! i will be induced at 38 weeks I am 33 weeks now. I wish u all the best jus do the best u can that's all we can do

Im on the 3 day glucose test diet rigjt now.. Dieabetes runs in my family. I dont have dieabetes but im almost sure im going to have GD. The tgought of it really *****... I just dont get it cuz im almost half way. I feel fine and my baby is perfect. I dont want them to jack me up on meds and needles i honestly dont feel i need right now.

My baby was only 5lbs. Dr had warned me that I would have a 9-10lb baby.. drink lots of water eat healthy and walk after meals.. remember your body is giving your baby everything first that's why our pancreas doesnt make enough insulin. that's why we get gestational diabetes. definitely take care of yourself..
@eevee_moon...i guess thats my biggest worry that they baby is in danger, as long their getting what they need Ill be more then content to deal with a stricter diet.

question: i just got the results and they weren't good. i have GD,  super upset and surprised because i have none of the risk factors. so nervous for me and my baby. :(
title: gestesinal diabetes
